name: Soul Harvest (itch) (inkEthic (inktrashing + cacoethic))
description:
SOUL HARVEST.

You are a very, very good boy trying to help a very tired Death Emissary complete his day's work gathering souls that are lingering in limbo.

This game was created for Bit Bridge Indies Halloween Game Jam. It was started on 10/17/20, and completed a week later on 10/24/20.

==========================================

A short game made in RPG Maker VX Ace focused on walking around with your tired friend and looking at strange, lightly-spooky things! :)

==========================================

Soul Harvest was produced by Inktrashing of the microstudio Inkethic. If you like this, please check out our other titles!

Please report any bugs, typos, visual aberrations or error codes to me, and I'll fix them as soon as possible!
